Logic.Games

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Logic.Games.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Games
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HotSeatGame

    public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, Games
    Abstract class that contains standard methods that will most likely used for all Game children. It is here where we move piece, check for game end or if a move is valid.
